title: 'Boys and Girl - Tavon Austin Fair Catch Fiasco; Garrett Second Guessing; Week 11 Lions Preview with Detroit Beat Writer Dave Birkett
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Tavon Austin Fair Catch Fiasco; Garrett Second Guessing; Week 11 Lions Preview with Detroit Beat Writer Dave Birkett
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby are joined by Dallas Morning News beat writer Michael Gehlken. What was Tavon Austin told and when was he told it? The trio discuss. Also, Lions beat writer Dave Birkett from the Detroit Free Press stops by to preview the Cowboys’ match-up with the Lions.Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys' community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
